description_translations.en: This document template guides core team members in the selection of knowledge, communication and evaluaiton assets that will be used in the thematic co-exploration. This very document also serves to indicate the customizations or generation of new assets needed for a thematic co-exploration.

name_translations.da: Viden, kommunikation og evaluering aktiver skabelon
name_translations.en: Knowledge, communication and evaluation assets template
name_translations.es: Plantilla de activos de conocimiento, comunicación y evaluación
name_translations.it: Modello di attività di conoscenza, comunicazione e valutazione
name_translations.lv: Zināšanu, komunikācijas un novērtēšanas aktīvu veidne
